content:
From: Peter Chapman <pc@cs.st-and.ac.uk>
Hi

Has something changed with isatool in Isabelle2008? All of my
installation works fine, but when I come to use the document
preparation stuff

isatool make clean
isatool make

my command line tells me the file isatool no longer exists. Indeed,
it doesn't exist in the same place as it did for Isabelle2007, which was

IsabelleHOME/bin/

(the file isabelle-interface is also not present in the newer version).

I know I can invoke Isabelle more easily now that I could, so do I
have to do something else to invoke the isatool document preparation
tools?

Thanks!

Peter

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
This looks more like you are using an unofficial version after
Isabelle2008. Plain "isabelle make" etc. should do the job -- there is
only one script wrapper left and it is called "isabelle".

Makarius
